summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented: the main Tabs navigation no longer includes a Cards tab, and CheckoutDialogâ€™s payment methods are limited to cash/gift card with no visible QR scanner panel usage in the shown diff. missing_requirements.requirement: Remove unused QR/custom-card frontend modules and dependencies from the build after the UI is reverted (components, hooks, and imports related to custom QR credit cards and scanning).

There is no evidence of these files being removed or fully de-referenced; only UI navigation/checkout selection appears reverted.
